subject: Steroids
Perjury
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The refusal of Greg Anderson, Barry Bonds’s longtime trainer, to testify at Bonds’s perjury trial on March 21 will leave the prosecution to explain his absence to the jury.
snippet: The refusal of Greg Anderson, Barry Bonds’s longtime trainer, to testify at Bonds’s perjury trial on March 21 will leave the prosecution to explain his absence to the jury.
